title: True Lies (1994) Arnold Schwarzenegger (DVDrip,OPT.MULTISUBS)
description:
Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portugese, Swedish, Turkish
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111503/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111503/</a>

With Jamie Lee Curtis, Tia Carrere, Bill Paxton and Tom Arnold.

Classic action comedy where Arnold shows that he has both self irony and humour. I had not suspected that until I saw this film.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.

Widescreen XviD 2-pass 720x304, really greast stereo AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
